name: Bink Video 2 File
summary: A BK2 file is a video file saved in the Bink Video 2 format, which is the second version of the Bink proprietary video format developed by RAD Game Tools. It contains data compressed with the Bink 2 video and audio codecs . BK2 files are used for playing movie clips in video games on both PCs and console systems.
